job description:
We are seeking a motivated Data Integration Intern. This position will be located in Chesterfield, Missouri, reporting to our Data Engagement and Integration Lead.

The Data Integration Intern will work with a team of data scientists and software engineers to support building automated data loading pipelines and to integrate and publish data to hubs from a variety of sources including database tables, composite views, and API calls. The published messages will then be consumed by topic subscribers for model building and API development.

Dates for this internship are May 13-August 2 of 2019

Responsibilities may include:

+ Analysis of software architecture and systems for novel data integration & messaging capabilities

+ Development of cloud based data integration processes aggregating data and automating the publication

+ Development of data validation processes to ensure data quality and integrity

+ Development of data analytics & visualization tools for data consumers

Required Skills/Experiences:

+ Currently enrolled at a university within the U.S. pursuing an undergraduate or graduate degree in Computer Science or related programs

+ At least 3.0 GPA on a 4.0 scale.

+ Must be returning to school to continue program of study upon completion of internship.

+ Programming skills in: Java, R or Python

+ Experience with version control systems such as Git

+ Experienced with Relational Databases such as Oracle and PostgreSQL, and Graph Database (Neo4j)

Desired Skills/Experiences:

+ Experience with cloud computing platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud or Microsoft Azure.

+ Experience with data hub

+ Experience with front-end applications such as Shiny and Spotfire
